# Grid Auto Rows

## Usage

For detailed information, please consult the Tailwind CSS documentation.

## Compatibility

| Class                  | Support     |
|------------------------|-------------|
| `auto-rows-auto`       | 🌐 Web only |
| `auto-rows-min`        | 🌐 Web only |
| `auto-rows-max`        | 🌐 Web only |
| `auto-rows-fr`         | 🌐 Web only |
